entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
